1.content:
The Trickster Goddess
The Trickster Goddess has been around since the dawn of mankind and is the only deity still living among the mortals. She loves altering peoples lives through transformations. Most of the transformations she does though are into things that aren't out of the ordinary like gender, objects, animals, shrinking, statues and a few body part alterations like swapping or removing genitalia.

Her powers are unlimited.

The Shapeshifter
The Shapeshifter can change himself or someone else into anything they desire. Sometimes this power can involve just removing a single body part or replacing it with something else.

Their power is limited only being able to make so many changes in a day.

The Hair Sorceress
The Hair Sorceress has living hair that she can control. They can also detach the hair from others and attach it where ever they chose. Their hair is also able to wrap around anything organic and turn it into hair, this include individual body parts or entire people.

Their power is limited to organic things and hair only.

The Game Master
The Game Master can only use their powers when challenging people to games. They will either give the players powers to use in this game or transform the losers of the game. Winning a game comes with a powerful reward, such as a wish, the ability to change themselves, keep a power permanently or be rewarded with a magical artifact.

Their power is unlimited.
1.title: Meet the beings

choices: Her Apartment in the big city
11.content:
Being immortal the Trickster Goddess has seen and done everything the world has to offer and people now all seem the same to her. In the past she's been a hands on deity, turning people into creatures of myth and legends but got bored of being worshiped. She's been a divine punisher, transforming the wicked and cruel, though there was never any shortage. She's been a wicked witch cursing entire towns, but that caused people to turn on each other and she detests violence. Now she prefers a quiet life where she transforms though who annoy her and blesses those who meet her crazy challenges. She doesn't kill and any time she transforms someone into an animal their lifespan is extended to what a human would have.

She is known to the Governments of the world, though they have learnt to leave her alone after military personnel ended up in zoos or toys and a few government leaders vanished. Depending on where she lives the local law enforcement might also be aware of her as her changes to people do lead to some interesting reports and people tend to go missing around her. She will co-operate with the police stations that know about her but her patience does wear thin.

The Goddess lives in several locations, switching them up as she choices. Her main residence is in the suburbs of a large town called Limestone Hills. She also runs a hobby farm in a remote location. She has apartments in several big cities and a rundown old shack just off an interstate highway.

At the moment the Goddess is in...
11.title: The Trickster Goddess

111.content:
The Goddess loved her current residence in Limestone Hills, in was in a lovely little street ran by one of those home societies people like to make so all the houses looked the same. The reason she loved that so much is because it meant there was someone to annoy when she broke the rules and people to transform if they broke the rules. It depended on her mood really, but the home society did go through many chairmen.

The town also saw a lot of out of visitors, being off a major travel route and out of town visitors were the kind of people the Goddess loved to mess with, some of them even came for her as she ran a blog about the strange and paranormal in regards to herself. Then there was the other blog she ran that also attracted visitors to her house, especially with the young adults reaching the end of their teens or early twenties, these were rewards she offered for meeting certain challenges.

Limestone Hills was a place she could take things easier while still having her fun. She loved the peace and quiet it usually had about it but sometimes she also liked disrupting it too.

Like now for instance as she was about to affect the life of...
111.title: Limestone Hills

choices: He is turned into a woman
1111.content:
Officer Ford was a young officer and new in town. He was transferred to Limestone Hills police station after reporting his fellow officers for various breaches of conduct. The other officers caught wind of this and he was transferred to this quiet town as a form of exile. He didn't mind it though, however the station was a little weird, with two pigs that just roamed freely and the boar head mounted in the main office that looked like it was watching him.

His current assignment was in regards to missing people and there were a lot of them, more than what a town like this should have, some were locals, while some were passing through town when they went missing. He was instructed to take the list to this address in a nearby suburb though he didn't understand why he'd be taking the entire missing persons list here.

He pulled up to the plain looking house and knocked on the door. He averted his eyes when a naked woman opened the door.

"Good morning, ma'am. I'm Officer Ford, I was told to consult you about some missing people?" He tried so hard to look her in the eyes and not down at the rest of her body.

"You're new," the Goddess commented as she walked inside, smirking at the officer's reaction to her nudity. He had passed the first test, he was polite to look away. "I like new, take a seat and I'll go put a robe on."

"Thank you ma'am" Ford said in regards to her hospitality and putting on something to cover herself up. When she returned he had the box of files on a coffee table. "So um, what exactly am I suppose to do?"

"You weren't briefed? Wow people must not like you, don't worry I'll sort them out for their rudeness later. You're here to ask me about the missing people in those files, I then tell you if it was me or not."

Ford was baffled by what she just said. "What do you mean if it was you?"

The Goddess sighed, she did not like explaining things. She sat down on her favorite chair and interlocked her fingers together. "I'm responsible for a lot of missing people, something you'll learn if you stick around long enough. Your job is to ask me who I'm responsible for because there's been a few times, where I wasn't responsible and a murderer got away or something. So I've politely agreed to these meetings in my home to go through these lists every so often. Now what I don't like is telling people how to do their jobs."

"Is this a joke?" Ford stood up and glanced over at the Goddess, not knowing the danger he was in. He didn't know what to make of this, if she was telling the truth, why was she allowed not behind bars, if she was lying then what was he doing her.

The Goddess rolled her eyes. "Who told you to come here?" She asked.

"Officer Bates, he's my..."

The Goddess raised her hand, silencing Ford and then clicked her fingers. Bates was in the room in an instant. "Officer Bates, I've been informed you assigned Officer Ford to the missing persons file yes?" She didn't wait for him to answer and Ford saw the fear in his eyes. "By not informing him of the complete nature of his job you have wasted all of our time. Now time might not mean much to me but I still hate it being wasted." She clicked her fingers. Ford stood their helplessly as the other Officer transformed into a grandfather clock before his eyes. The Goddess then returned her attention to Officer Ford. "Now I hope that explains everything, now since I can't trust you to do your job I'm going to do it for you."

The Goddess started going through the files:

Yes - Letter box
Yes - Cat
Yes - Frog
Yes - Crush's breast
Yes - Dick
Yes - Jacket
Yes - Mouse (the animal)
Yes - Shrunk (being cared for)
Yes - Head (gave her body away)
Yes - Doll
No
Officer Bates - Clock

She wrote that last one on a piece of paper and put it in the box with the other files. "Well it looks like you have a missing boy to find," the Goddess unfroze Officer Ford and returned the box to him. "You may leave now but first, for wasting my time at the start I'm going to have to punish you. It'll only be a minor one, you can still carry out your duties"
1111.title: A police officer

11111.content:
"Hmm, a quick gender change never hurt," the Goddess mused. "This is going to hurt a little, I could make in instant but there's no fun in that."

Ford collapsed on the ground as he felt a hard tug on his groin, her grabbed his crotch and felt his manhood changed form in his hands, as his testicle pushed up into his body and formed into ovaries. His pelvis crack and shuffled as his hips widened and his waist narrowed. He couldn't feel his penis anymore but felt the folds of his new vulva through the jeans of his shorts.

He got out of the fetus position and was on his hands and knees. His hands began to shift and reform before his very eyes as the became more dainty. He felt the flesh on his chest begin to grow, as it pushed against his shirt and his face felt like it was on fire. His hair became softer and silkier, and long enough to cover his entire view as he stared down at the carpet.

He was breathing deeply as his whole body broke out in sweat, leaving him drenched and smelling different from what he was use to. As he stood up his clothes felt very loose as they hadn't adjusted to his new body. He could see his new breasts clearly through his drenched white shirt and the gaps between the buttons.

"What..." he said in a new feminine voice but the witch raised her hand.

"I've heard this all before, you're either going to break down and cry, get all freaked out or abuse me and demand I turn you back. On the rare occasion some men like the change as soon as I make it. You seem the sort that'll go into shock and just ignore the changes for now, though I have been wrong before. Anyway if you're going to cry or start losing it, please do so in your car or back at home, tears bore me. If you're going to yell at and abuse me, you're getting changed again."

Officer Ford looked at the Goddess with a burning hatred in his eyes as he touched the holster of his pistol.

"Oh, that wasn't an expected outcome, I'll tell you what I'll let you get a shot off then we'll decide what happens next."
11111.title: He is turned into a woman

choices: She turns Ford into a Fence Paling
Officer Ford begins to turn to stone
111113.content:
Officer Ford continued to stare at the Goddess, he or rather she, had drawn her pistol and was aiming at the Goddess's chest. Though she hesitated to fire her weapon, her training had kicked in, the Goddess was unarmed and seemed to pose no risk, however she was a being of immense power and had turned people into object among other things, she was a danger to the whole world.

The Goddess just mused at Officer Ford, she didn't consider her a risk and she was generally curious if she'd be brave enough to take the shot. However after a minute of staring her down the Goddess bemusement turned to boredom, and if Officer Ford lowered her weapon now and walked away there would be consequences for wasting the Goddess's time.

"Either shoot me or don't" the Goddess demanded as she took a step to the right, the pistol staying locked on. "Oh for my stake! Make up your damn mind already!."

Officer Ford ignored her as he played out all the scenarios in her head. There was a strong chance that the Goddess would just survive the shot and she'd be made to suffer. If it worked would her changes even be undone, if not Ford could live with being a woman if it meant not another soul was changed. There was also the chance she could just fake being a normal person making it look like Ford had entered her home and shot her without cause, in which case how would that play out.

Before Officer Ford could make up her mind, the Goddess had disappeared from her view and was now behind her. "I told you to make up your mind, so now we're going with option number three."
111113.title: Indecision

choices: The suspect has been turned into another living being
The suspect is now an object of some kind
1112.content:
The Goddess opened the door, naked as she always did, it was always fun to get reactions out of people, either as a personal laugh or as an excuse to punish them.

The man at her door didn't seemed to impressed with her the instant she opened the door. "Good morning Ma'am, US Marshal," he waved his badge in front of her, he didn't say anything about her being naked but she could tell he wasn't impressed and seemed to be here on urgent business. "May I come in?" He didn't even let the Goddess answer before stepping inside.

"May I ask what this is about?" She asked, feigning ignorance, it wasn't the first time a Marshal had come to visit her.

"I believe you are harboring a fugitive. I have been tracking down this man," he showed the Goddess a picture of his suspect. "Across tw states and I have eye witness reports of him entering this property and hasn't been seen since."

"You didn't tell anyone you were coming here did you?" The Goddess asked. "Because if you did, your bosses would've told you to drop the case, though now it's too late."

"Is that a threat ma'am?"

"Of course not, now let me go get your fugitive," the Goddess walked down the hall. "I caught him breaking in a few days ago," she explained. "I figured he needed a good home, so I gave him one, let me show you."
1112.title: A US Marshal

15.content:
The Task Master
The Task Master is related to The Game Master and can only give other people powers. Unlike The Game Master, instead of challenging people to games, they instead give them a task. If a person fails to complete this task, then the Task Master may transform them.

Their power is unlimited.

The Tattoo Artist
The tattoo artist is able to turn anything into a tattoo and bring people's tattoos to life. They can even swap tattoos between people.

Their power is limited to tattoos.

The Gift Giver
The Gift Giver is a being with no body and unable to change the world themselves, however they are able to attach to a host and give them a power. This power can come with drawbacks either from the power itself or self imposed rules chosen by the Gift Giver. The person only holds onto the power while they are a host and the Gift Giver can leave them at any time.

Their power is limited to a host and only one power may be given at a time.

The Stage Magician
The Stage Magician doesn't have powers themselves and uses a wide range of magical items to change people. They do have an assistant or two, though they also like audience participation.

Their power is limited to their tools.
15.title: Wave 2

152.content:
Roxy Inkster (a name she gave herself) was a woman in her 20s, and was covered in tattoos, going from her ankles all the way up to her neck. She wore very little clothing, usually short shorts, a mesh top and a bra, so that she was able to show off as many tattoos as possible, while covering the more intimate ones. Everyone of her tattoos had a story and she liked showing them off.

She worked at a local tattoo parlor, a place she used to visit often before she gained her powers, as a receptionist. She actually wasn't a great artist herself. There were a few people that knew of her powers, including some of her closer friends, who had received tattoos from her. A few others that knew about her, wish they hadn't.

Roxy didn't like taking crap from anyone and so she was never afraid to use her powers on someone who angered her or her friends. Sometimes she'd even use them for a good laugh at someone else's expense. She never really cared about the lives she affected when turning someone into ink.

How does this story begin?
152.title: The Tattoo Artist

info.brief_description: A story about powerful being that can transform people in different ways.
info.description:
I came up with this chapter because, like the trickster Goddess, I had other character ideas in my head that I wanted to explore. I didn't want to use my limited interactive items on each one so decided to include an interactive that involves these powerful beings and anyone else I might come up with later. I am someone with a lot of ideas and find many branching ideas in my head, which is why I created it as an interactive. Sometimes I have an idea of a different outcome though don't always know where it'll lead so I do encourage people to add to this story.

This interactive contains several stories about beings with the ability to transform people in one form or another. Some of these people have limitations to their powers, while some can do practically anything they put their minds to.

Rules
Death of any of the characters are fine. Though that doesn't mean the story has to end, their can be new victims or the beings might be able to bring them back

When dealing with characters under the age of 18, be mindful how you treat them, I will not tolerate any nudity or sex and these chapters will be deleted. I'd rather not have anyone under age but that does remove the possibilities certain changes.

Be mindful of other people when writing, leaving as many options available as possible. If you can only add two paths I'd rather you do 'more options' as the second choice allowing for others to add their own ideas. On that note be careful how long you make your chapters, they shouldn't be too short however they should also leave room for choice. So don't write too many transformations or actions in a single chapter where another choice was available.

I am impulsive and do change my mind often so do except to see the occasional change in the structure of the interactive or some of my additions being edited. I will try not to delete chapters and if an idea I thought of gets taken I will use the more options or edit the choices so both out ideas for that choice can be expressed. (On that note, if anyone wanted to add to a particular option that was taken feel free to repeat that choice with your own idea).
